about_the_game:
A First-Person CO-OP Shooter that has Unforgiving, Hardcore, Horror, Looting, Extraction elements with Procedural Generation and Perma-Death.

Overview: Welcome to Exile Protocol, a heart-pounding sci-fi first-person shooter that thrusts you and your friends into the depths of procedurally generated bunkers teeming with nightmarish creatures. In this brutal world, survival is the only goal, and every decision could mean the difference between life and permanent death.

Gameplay: Team up in online co-op mode to face the horrors together. As daring scavengers, you’ll strategize and coordinate to navigate the claustrophobic halls filled with treacherous paths, valuable loot, and horrifying monsters—each with their own distinctive sensory abilities. Some creatures are adept at detecting sound, while others are drawn to light or have acute vision. Communicate effectively to adapt your tactics and outsmart these beasts.

With friends by your side, you’ll balance risk and reward. Do you sneak past a lurking monster to secure a rare weapon, or do you engage in a firefight, knowing that the noise could attract even more deadly foes? The loot you gather will be vital not only for your immediate survival but also for enhancing your team’s abilities and gear for future runs.

Perma-Death Mechanics: In Exile Protocol, death is final. Each run presents a new challenge, and when one of you falls, that character is lost forever. This high-stakes mechanic amplifies the tension for your entire team, making every choice carry weight. Will you take calculated risks together, or play it safe? The choice is yours, but be ready for the consequences.

Features:

  • Procedurally Generated Bunkers: Each expedition offers a fresh experience, with layouts, loot, and monster placements changing every time you enter.

  • Varied Monsters: Encounter a diverse array of horrifying creatures, each with unique strengths and weaknesses. Learn their behaviors to survive and loot effectively.

  • Dynamic Loot System: Collect a wide range of weapons, gear, and resources to enhance your characters and increase your chances of extraction.

  • High Tension Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a haunting soundscape and visual design that keeps your adrenaline pumping as you creep through the dark.

  • Online Co-op: Team up with friends to strategize and tackle challenges together, enhancing your chances of survival and making every run an unforgettable adventure.

Objective: Your mission is clear: explore the eerie depths of the bunkers, collect valuable loot, and extract safely—all while working as a team. But tread carefully—every shadow could conceal a predator, and every sound could be your last.

Are you and your friends ready to face the horrors of Exile Protocol? The bunkers are waiting, and the monsters are hungry. Will you emerge victorious, or will you become just another name on the list of the lost? The choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Horrifying scenes, sounds, monsters
- Intense gun violence against monsters, realistic blood when shooting monsters
- Realistic blood on walls, floor

name: Exile Protocol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 with 3GB of video RAM or Radeon RX 580 with 4GB of video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX or Radeon RX5600 or above
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Team up with friends in a heart-pounding sci-fi shooter, where every run through dark, procedurally generated bunkers is a fight for survival. Face nightmarish creatures, gather crucial loot, and navigate deadly choices—because in this world, death is permanent.
